mapper.sql: collection_log_id, invitation_id, create_time, create_user_id, deleted, version
mapper.insert:
insert into bbs_collection_log (invitation_id, create_time, create_user_id, deleted, version) values
(#{item.invitationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.version,jdbcType=BIGINT})
